question: 仏教
sourceMnemonic: The <kanji>buddha</kanji> <kanji>teach</kanji>ings are what you have to learn when you're studying <vocabulary>Buddhism</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well. Note that <ja>仏</ja> gets changed to <ja>ぶっ</ja> for this one.
